name: Gem Dasher
description:
In Gem Dasher you need to collect as many gems as you can without dieing to the enemies or plummeting to your death.

Gem Dasher was made for the 2018 GMTK game jam.

It follows the theme of "Genre without Mechanic" by removing the boulders from Boulder Dash. And the walls, cause they're rocks as well. And the floor! Basically everything that's normally rock. And when you remove the boulders from Boulder Dash, only Dash is left. So I made it about dashing... I know, it really stretches the theme but when I had the idea while panicking during the jam, I was really hyped about it...

Controls:

[SPACE] [LMB] - dash towards cursor

Q/A:

Q: Why is the character in a panda costume?

A: I don't know... It's cute and I made the decision at 1AM.

Q: Why are there moments where no enemies spawn?

A: Cause I screwed up and I'm still mad at myself!
